attributes.action: Lower the fuel prices across UK
attributes.additional_details: Affecting millions of people. Having a knock on effect as people can’t afford to go to work in which case they can’t afford to pay bills or put food on the table. It will cause a national breakdown as people will struggle and less money will be circulated amongst the country. This will eventually cause an economic crash.
attributes.background: Lower fuel prices as they are too high. People can’t afford it and in fact this is causing the cost of living to go up drastically.

rejection.details:
The cost of fuel is a matter for retailers, not the UK Government or the House of Commons. 

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a related action:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
